meanings.sent1: The branny cereal had a rough texture.
meanings.sent2: Her skin felt branny after using the exfoliating scrub.
meanings.sent3: The branny toast made the breakfast more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The old book had a branny smell that reminded me of autumn.
meanings.sent5: The branny snow covered the ground like a blanket of crumbs.

meanings.sent1: The branny muffin had a crunchy top.
meanings.sent2: The trail mix was full of branny bits of grain.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his branny hair looked like he had rolled in cereal.
meanings.sent4: The branny path through the forest was a trail of crumbs.
meanings.sent5: The branny cake was a delightful mix of textures.
